resources.string: CGMLoop
Nightscout site URL
e.g., https://yoursite.azurewebsites.net
Data mode
BG-only, Loop data (can also use for bg/pump/iob/cob), or OpenAPS data
BG-only
iOS Loop data or BG+pump/iob/cob
OpenAPS data
Show seconds instead of watch battery % - may use battery faster (seconds change color at watch battery 50% and 25% levels)
Show seconds instead of watch battery % - may use battery faster (seconds change color at watch battery 50% and 25% levels)
Respect watch device Do-Not-Disturb (if supported) to silence CGMLoop vibrations/alarms
Respect watch device Do-Not-Disturb (if supported) to silence CGMLoop vibrations/alarms
Enable watch up/down buttons or touch swipe gestures to silence CGMLoop vibrations/alarms
Enable watch up/down buttons or touch swipe gestures to silence CGMLoop vibrations/alarms
Enable for mg/DL (disable for mmol NOTE: mmol not yet supported for Loop/OpenAPS)
Enable for mg/DL (disable for mmol NOTE: mmol not yet supported for Loop/OpenAPS)
BG low warning level
e.g., warn when below 80 mg/DL (or 4.4 mmol)
BG high warning level
e.g., warn when above 180 mg/DL (or 10 mmol)
BG low alert level
e.g., alert when below 70 mg/DL (or 3.9 mmol)
BG high alert level
e.g., alert when above 240 mg/DL (or 13.3 mmol)
Predicted BG low warning level
e.g., warn when below 80 mg/DL (or 4.4 mmol)
Predicted BG high warning level
e.g., warn when above 180 mg/DL (or 10 mmol)
Predicted BG low alert level
e.g., alert when below 70 mg/DL (or 3.9 mmol)
Predicted BG high alert level
e.g., alert when above 240 mg/DL (or 13.3 mmol)
BG update elapsed time warning
e.g., warn when 15 minutes has elapsed without a BG update
BG update elapsed time alert
e.g., alert when 30 minutes has elapsed without a BG update
Pump battery % warning level
e.g., warn when pump battery is below 40 percent
Pump battery % alert level
e.g., alert when pump battery is below 30 percent
Pump battery voltage warning level
e.g., warn when pump battery is below 1.25 volts
Pump battery voltage alert level
e.g., alert when pump battery is below 1.10 volts
Uploader battery warning level
e.g., warn when uploader battery is below 40%
Uploader battery alert level
e.g., alert when uploader battery is below 30%
Reservoir warning level
e.g., warn when pump reservoir is below 40U
Reservoir alert level
e.g., alert when pump reservoir is below 30U
